description: Main source file for a Flutter application that initializes the app with a simple home page displaying a message and a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a centered message and a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, calls runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructs the widget tree for the app and home page.
